text: Ruze, ki Alloh hamai munofiqonro az qaʙrhojason zinda mekunad, pas hamcunon ki dar dunjo ʙaroi sumo qasam mexurdand, ʙaroi U ham qasam xohand xurd, ki mu'minand. Va mepindorand, ki in qasam dar nazdi Alloh foidaason medihad, cunone, ki dar dunjo nazdi mu'minon foidaason medod. Ogoh ʙosed, ki haroina, onho xele duruƣgujonand
